Not enough workers, failed to form a proper company!\nMaybe you can check the /grouplist and join the others.
You are working for an IT Company, which is experiencing a downsize. The Seniors Assholes are blaming others to secure their place. Kick them off and save the company!
Cheater {0} has been banned for attempting an exploit (no names starting with /).
{0} please change your name before joining.
We are no longer recruiting. We already have too much workers here!
{0} has joined the company. We have {1} workers now. We need at least {2} to form a company, and we {3} are more than enough for us.
{0}, please start the bot {1} if you want to join the game.
We do not accept your resignation.
Coward {0} connot handle the stress from work. So he left.
{0} players remain.
I gotcha, but I wasn't asking...
You are not in the company!
I do not remember such a worker.
The one you picked was gone.
{0} wanted to planted {1} a surprise.
{0} suspected {1} is the shit Senior coder here.
{0} didn't give his opinions twice in a row. I guess he's no different from a dead person.\n{1}
As a Popcorn Lover, you really hate the boredom here as all the Seniors died. So you ask youself: What not become one if you do want to watch the world burns? You are a Senior Asshole now!
Gotcha!
\n{0} is the real Department Manager, who could peek anyone's profile at lunch.
Finally, {0} is gone, and you are no longer a Department Trainee, but a Department Manager. You may access other's appraisal reports at lunch.
Finally, {0} has graduated from the trainee program, filling {1}'s place as the new Department Manager.
Through peeking at the appraisal report, you know {0} is {1}.
Who do you think is the Senior Asshole here?
Whose work you would like to check?
You want the board to fire who? You can name {0} more.
Who do you want to sneak?
Whose appraisal report has kept you interested?
Whose computer need your protection?
Who would you like to plant? Name it and kick him out of the office!
Who do you think is using JAVA in their works?
You want who to be your dedicated tutor, leading your through the internship?
JAVA IS THE BEST! You want to share the best thing with who?
Your friends {0} would like to discuss with you!
and

You are the Bootlicker 😾 and you always monitor and protect your computer from any threats. Even at lunch, you will check the status of your computer with youe mobile. When anyone is doing anything to your computer, you will notice at the very second and take your action! If the Seniors really is planting things to you computer, you will lick the boot of the Seniors hard, until they allow you to join their plan.

You are the Performance Evaluator 🕵. You can connect to others' computer and check their work in the afternoon, and you will know who is good and who is bad. Warning: The Seniors may notice the abnormality in the company network.

You are Suicidal 🍻, you have achieved nothing in your life but your job. When you are planted and fired, you'll probrably jump out of the company's window. The Seniors Assholes may feel guilty and shocked for a while. They will then halt their evil plan on the next day.

You are the Security Supervisor 👼. You can access other's computer at lunch, to maintain their computer and probrably do some upgrades too. When you are maintaining the computer, no others could do evil things on it.
You are the Most Trusted Employee 🔫 by the board. Say the names and the board will fire them for you. You have two chances.
You disgusting Stalker 💋. You stalk and you know things. You work on notebook and you record your stalking experience with it. Careful: Don't stalk the wrong people, or you are doomed.

As a Popcorn Lover 🖕, you enjoy drama, and dramatic life attracts you even more. When all the seniors are gone and the world is filled with peace? That's definitely a hell made of boredom. So you decided to lit the world and watch it burns.

Congrats, you are the Senior Asshole 🐺 that everyone hates. Working hard maybe good for the company, but who cares about the company anyway? You are the Senior, do whatever you want and blame the shits on the others, as written in the book "How To Be Truly Sucessful Volume 2".

You are the Department Manager 👳. You want to make the company great again, keeping the good workers and fire the bad shits. Good news is that, you can access one appraisal report of others every lunch.
You are a Programmer 👱. Work hard, before getting fired.
You are the Boss 👺, if anyone blame you for anything, they are all screwed.
You are the Intern 👶. Pick someone as your dedicated tutor. If he is fired, you will go riot and look for vengeance.
You are the Secretary 👁. You take minutes and send emails, so you know who is the real Department Manager.
You are the Management Trainee 🙇. You will eventually become a Department Manager when the time comes.
You are the JAVA Enthusiast 👤! JAVA is the best, so lets the world know. Warning: Haters gonna hate.

You are the JAVA Destroyer 💂. You have a dream that one day no one would use JAVA for coding. You believe JAVA users exist in the company and they are the true cause of company's struggle. You shall check others' computer at lunch, and report if you find one.
After a thoughtful night, you should have guessed who are the Seniors Assholes.\n\nYou have {0} seconds to vote them out.

Time to get off!

You have {0} seconds to make your accusations and defenses.

It's lunch time! Grab some food and fill your starving stomach! Please enjoy your lunch, as it might be the last lunch you would have in this company 😜\n\nFor those who are busy at lunch: You have {0} seconds to act.
The workers have shown their hatred towards {0}, farewell my friend.\n{1}
Looks like you could not make a clear decision. Let's forget about this round.
No one has accused anyone. Nothing happens.

{0}'s codes have been revealed. Shit codes everywhere, and he didn't even get the file name right! How could you evaluate others' work if you are doing the wrong things youself?\nThe Performance Evaluator 🕵 is fired.

{0}'s codes are projected in the conference room. Is he putting Trojans in our projects? Who could have thought our Security Supervisor is the biggest threat in our company?\nThe Security Supervisor 👼 is fired.

The model employee of the company, they said. Obviously {0}'s codes was not done by himself. Proves are here showing that he was just copying others' codes without crediting. What a shame!\nThe Most Trusted Employee 🔫 is fired.
A secret deal has been found in the drawer of {0}'s room. He was selling our confidential documents to the competitors! What a traitor!?\nThe Department Manager 👳 is fired.

We all know {0} is not a good programer, but we still underestimated how bad he really is. Spelling mistakes could be found everywhere in his works, even mispelling FALSE as LEAFS!
The Suicidal 🍻 is fired.


Bang! Securities downstair just discover his body on the ground floor...

{0} was caught saving the confidentials of our workers to a private drive, trying to carry the classified information out of the company. Leaking information is a serious crime especially in a IT Company!\n The HR Bitch is fired.
Copies of {0}'s poor works are distributed in everyone's hand. I hope no one would commit these mistakes every again.\n{1}
{0} is a JAVA Enthusiast, using JAVA in all his works, causing lags in our servers! Glad that the JAVA Destroyer has him spotted.
Everyone is working hard in the company. No potential threat is spotted today.
You tired hard confronting the Seniors and securing your place in the company. You are now promoted as a Senior!
These are your Senior friend(s): {0}
You do enjoy {0}'s speech, and decided to include him in your plan!
You did work hard, but you are planted by the Seniors Assholes! Now the board sees you as a dobe and decided to fire you...
Who would ever thought, {0} could commit suicide just becuase he lose a job? Maybe you should think twice before excuting your evil plan.
You accidentally supervised the Seniors and they planted you instead. Being nice does not secure a happy ending...
You sucessfully saved {0} from actual threats!
You did great on maintaining {0}'s computer, but no actaul threat was found during lunch.
You tried to access {0} computer, but it was locked!
The Security Supervisor has located some threats from the Seniors! Be careful!
Disgusting! {0}'s notebook has stored many personal information of others.\nThe Stalker 💋 is fired.
You could not connect to {0}'s computer...
Told you not to stalk the wrong person, for example {0}. YOU ARE DOOMED!
{0} stalked the Seniors at lunch. What a disgusting move!\nThe Stalker 💋 is fired.
{0} sneaked in {1} room, trying to copy {1} personal files. Luckily, {0}'s weird action was caught by our Seniors.\nThe Stalker 💋 is fired.
You want to know others'secret, but you don't want to exchange with yours. You stalked behind {0} and listened carefully from his mouth. You even record it with your phone...
You are a curious person. You sneaked in {0}'s room, trying to find his darkest secret. You found some tapes in the computer and you kept a copy in your notebook.
You felt someone was looking you during lunch, but you couldn't find who...
When you were back from lunch, you noticed some documents on your desk were moved...
You noticed weird connections comming from {0}'s computer. That must be the Performance Evaluator!
After browsing the computer of {0}, you guess he is probably the {1}.
{1} was stalking {0} and {0} do not like it. So he reported {1}'s disgusting action to the board and have him fired.\nThe Stalker 💋 is fired.
{0} has been hating {1} since they met. Today, {0} was annoyed by {1} again, and he wanted to put a stop on that. So {0} make the board have him fired.\n{2}
The Senior has fired all the others but himself! ALL HAIL THE ASSHOLES!
The Seniors have fired all the others but themselves! ALL HAIL THE ASSHOLES!
The Workers have all the Seniors fired and guard the company from all evil beings! They have made the company great again!
Shit! You just blamed the BOSS for all the mess! He was hugely disappointed and he rather start a new business than work with you retarded.
Remaining Workers, title, and team:
{0} wants to share the joy of JAVA with {1}.
{0} was promoting JAVA to {1}, which is a JAVA hater! He was reported and fired!
{0} wanted you to use JAVA, ridiculous! You reported him for justice! You senses there are {1} more people using JAVA.
You have finally discovered the joy of using JAVA! You can't wait to share it with others every lunch!
These are your JAVA friends: {0}
{0} have decided to use JAVA in the rest of his life.
{0} tried to find {1}, but he could not locate {1}.
Although the Seniors are gone, everyone in the company is using JAVA now. I guess the company is stuggling even more than before...
{0} will be fired anyway.
You were checking {0}'s work, and you saw JAVA codes everywhere. You reported to board and make sure he is fired.
You are glad that {0} was not using JAVA at all.
The dedicated tutor of {0} was fired. The intern now wants vengence.
You tutor {0} was fired. You are looking for vengence and these people have prepared a plan for you: {1}

You are the Project Manager 🏹. For some reasons, you believe 1+1 is greater than 2. You made 2 programmers a permanent team, they shall take care of each other, and share the consequences together.
You are the Freelancer 🎭. You can choose to share anyone's workload. If he is fired, you will inherit his position in the company.
You are the Blackmail Master 🎯. You hold many secrets, especially the dark secrets. You may reveal some of the secrets when you are triggered.
You are the Virus Spreader 🔪. Spread some seeds and let it grow. You knock someone's computer down and they are doomed.
The Project Manager thinks working with {0} will be good for you!

They suspected you are the shits coder in the company, but you're not. They tried to have you fired and you are triggered! You decided to reveal some secrets and drag someone down with you! Who will you choose?
{0} says a name without giving the deatils. Nothing surprising is revealed.
{0} decided to take the secrets with him. He will not say anything before he leave.

{0} is triggered and decided to drag somebody down with him. He chooses you, {1}. Your affairs with all the cleaning ladies in building are revealed with photos. The board was shocked, and decided to fire {1}, in order to protect company's reputation. {1} is fired.\n{2}
You know you will be fired with all the "evidences" planted. Why not act a little more evil before leaving?
At the end, the {0} did not revealed any secrets without purpose. Guess the Blackmail Master has his own code of moral too.
{0} knows he was planted by the Seniors, and he was not triggered. The Blackmail Master decided to save the secrets for future, but not reveal them here, dragging peopele down with him meaninglessly.
{0} revealed the darkest secrets of {1} before leaving. Turns out {1} was a Justin Bieber fanboy. Yuck, disgusting!\n【{2}】
{0} was sharing his JAVA works to {1} via his computer, then {0}'s computer was infected by virus! All his files are either missing or returning error! He is doomed.

The Blackmail Master noticed the Seniors was planting him. Although he could not stopped the planting, he identified one of them was {0} and revealed his disgustuing dark secrets to the board.\nThe Seniors Asshole 🐺 is fired.

The Blackmail Master noticed the Seniors was planting him. He blocked their access and identified one of Seniors was {0}! So he revealed the name with the related disgustuing dark secrets to the board.\nThe Seniors Asshole 🐺 is fired.
{0} was trying to plant something on the computer of the Virus Spreader. At the moment he granted the access of it, his own computer was infected by the virus.\n The Senior Asshole 🐺 is fired.
{0}'s computer was formated becuase of virus, losing all the progress of his handling projects. The board cannot accept such a mistake and fired {0}.\n{1}

You was trying to infect {0}'s computer with your new invented virus DragonSlayerV2, but you noticed the Security Superviosr was blocking the gateway. You just wasted your valuable lunch time trying to hack a disconnected computer.
{0} annoyed {1} when he talked too much about JAVA. {1} reported his darkest secrets to the board and make him disappear from the company.
You tried to maintain the computer of the Virus Spreader, and you are now doomed by twenty sneaky virus from his computer.
You sneaked in {0}'s room and tried to steal some personal file from his computer, but what you have stolen were only virus...
{0} sneaked in the wrong room and copied the wrong files. His computer is now doomed because of virus.

{0}'s actions has brought him the consequences, and {1} has his fault too because he didn't stop {0} from doing bad. {1} needed to take the consequences as well.\n【{2}】
